reviews.text: We were directed to this restaurant because it was one of the few restaurants open in Sansepolico today. Maybe we caught them on a bad day.
reviews.title: Careless service

reviews.text: The service was slow, because there was only one young member of staff working. One of our main course choices was not available, so they simply did not bring anything at all. No warning, no attempt to offer an alternative until we complained.
reviews.title: Great Restaurant !
